original_title: Metallica - Live At Festivalpark, Werchter, Belgium - July 4th, 1993
overview: LIVE AT FESTIVALPARK, WERCHTER, BELGIUM - JULY 4TH, 1993 - From the Black Album deluxe box set.  SETLIST:  1 Creeping Death  2 Harvester of Sorrow  3 Welcome Home (Sanitarium)  4 Of Wolf and Man  5 Wherever I May Roam  6 The Thing That Should Not Be  7 The Unforgiven  8 Disposable Heroes  9 Bass Solo  10 Instrumental Medley (Includes excerpts of "Orion", "To Live Is To Die" and "The Call of Ktulu")  11 Guitar Solo  12 The Four Horsemen  13 For Whom the Bell Tolls  14 Fade to Black  15 Master of Puppets (Short Version)  16 Seek and Destroy  17 Battery  18 Nothing Else Matters  19 Sad But True  20 Last Caress  21 One  22 Enter Sandman  23 So What (Featuring the Road Crew on Background Vocals)
title: Metallica - Live At Festivalpark, Werchter, Belgium - July 4th, 1993
